br.font: Starting 3/18, we are offering free meals for children ages 18 and under.
On Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, lunch and breakfast can be picked up between 11:30-12:30 at door #2. All meals are cook's choice.
Please call before 9:00 a.m. with your name and number of children's' meals you will need. 605-862-8108 ext 120.

strong.font: On Census Day, April 1, 2020, start shaping your future and the future of all children by counting everone in your home.

br.font: For more information please read the attached flyers:
